info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-gir-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for IOS-XE maintenance mode (GIR) operational data.
     Copyright (c) 2018-2019, 2022 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Other Services
**Paths:** 2

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-gir-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-gir-oper.yang)

enter-mmode-without-tmpl-init.description: Counter for initial process when entering maintenance mode without template

enter-mmode-tmpl-init.description: Counter for initial process when entering maintenance mode with template

entered-mmode.description: Counter for successfully entering maintenance mode

exit-mmode-init.description: Counter for initial process when exiting maintenance mode

exited-mmode.description: Counter for successfully exiting maintenance mode

entered-mmode-tmpl.description: Counter for entering maintenance mode with template

already-in-trans.description: Counter for changing maintenance mode when already in transition

clients-registered.description: Counter for number of times clients registered to maintenance mode subsystem

clients-deregistered.description: Counter for number of times clients deregistered from maintenance mode subsystem

prc-yielded.description: Counter for maintenance mode process yielded
